channel.title: golang on Jason Scheirer
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Jason Scheirer

item.title: The Anime Watcher: Another Game
item.description: I wrote another game game for a Weekend Game Jam with an Anime theme. A short bit of interactive fiction. It’s Webassembly using ebitengine. Play The Anime Watcher on itch.io

item.title: Trump Run: A Game
item.description: I wrote a game inspired by a tweet a coworker shared on a work Slack channel a few weeks back. It’s Webassembly using ebitengine. Play Trump Run on itch.io

item.title: Little Guys! A Puzzle Game Without Enough Levels
item.description: I wrote another small puzzle game for a Weekend Game Jam with the theme Colors. It’s Webassembly using ebitengine. Play Little Guys (A Puzzle Game) on itch.io
